name: Alobaidi Captcha
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
Alobaidi Captcha

Add captcha to forms easily, comment form, login form, register form, rest password form, easy to use and translate ready, no spam comments with Alobaidi Captcha.

The Features

  1. Just activate this plugin to add captcha, easy to use See Installation.
  2. No spam comments with Alobaidi Captcha! See Screenshots.
  3. All WordPress forms support, login form, comment form, register form, reset password form.
  4. Options to disable any captcha for any form.
  5. Option to disable comment captcha if user is logged.
  6. Translate ready, translate texts and error messages to your language easily.
  7. Compatible with any wordpress theme, no need to customize CSS.
  8. RTL ready.

Live Demo

  • http://wp-plugins.in/Alobaidi_Captcha

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate Alobaidi Captcha plugin
  • Read people reviews

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘alobaidi-captcha’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Plugins > Alobaidi Captcha.
  4. Read this article.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation

  1. Upload ‘alobaidi-captcha’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Plugins > Alobaidi Captcha.
  4. Read this article.

FAQ

  • Read this article.
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on Twitter.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Removing “?>” at the end of the code in the plugin files.
  • If you are experiencing this problem “Cannot send session cookie – headers already sent by…”, read this instructions.

1.0.2

  • Fixing problem in admin comment.

1.0.1

  • New error message.

1.0.0

First version.
